message: and playing the Fox Theatre on Cinco de Mayo
New song is good! (and available for free download from the pitchfork link above)
They're too good of songwriters to not have another stellar album at some point in the future if this one falls a bit flat though
Fleet Foxes at the Fox tickets are now on sale at TicketMaster--presale password is "cheval"
I've actually seen them live twice and they were fantastic both times.  I highly recommend seeing them.
I'm a little worried about the new album though... I think they're getting a little too lofty
The lyrics on that one song seem forced and they played a couple other new ones live when I saw them that just kind of felt uderwhelming
"If I had a field I'd work till I'm sore" totally sums up the indie zeitgeist though
i really love the new song, even if the lyrics do feel a litlte forced
I have my tickets for the show at the Fox, the couple of times I've seen them have been incredible. Robin Pecknold opening for Joanna Newsom was also outstanding.
@chrisdelbuck i missed the joanna/robin show by a hair of mistiming. made me extremely sad
